productive_cycle.description: The generating/producing cycle where one element nourishes another

wood_feeds_fire.explanation: Wood nourishes Fire, enhancing this crystal's energy for your chart

fire_creates_earth.explanation: Fire produces Earth, providing grounding and stability

earth_bears_metal.explanation: Earth generates Metal, supporting structure and clarity

metal_enriches_water.explanation: Metal produces Water, deepening intuition and flow

water_nourishes_wood.explanation: Water feeds Wood, promoting growth and expansion

controlling_cycle.description: The restraining/controlling cycle where one element dominates another

wood_controls_earth.warning: Wood dominates Earth - may feel destabilizing, use cautiously

fire_controls_metal.warning: Fire melts Metal - may create tension or overstimulation

earth_controls_water.warning: Earth blocks Water - may restrict emotional flow

metal_controls_wood.warning: Metal cuts Wood - may limit creative expansion

water_controls_fire.warning: Water extinguishes Fire - may dampen passion and vitality

same_element.description: When crystal element matches chart element - direct strengthening
same_element.explanation: Same element - directly strengthens and supports your elemental energy

interpretation_guide.100+: Exceptional match - This crystal strongly supports your Bazi chart
interpretation_guide.75-99: Excellent match - Highly beneficial for your elemental balance
interpretation_guide.50-74: Good match - Supportive with minor considerations
interpretation_guide.25-49: Moderate match - May help specific areas but use mindfully
interpretation_guide.0-24: Use with caution - May create elemental imbalance
interpretation_guide.below 0: Avoid - Likely to create disharmony in your chart
